output: Print all numbers according to the explanation presented above. Each number must be printed in one line as shown below.
input: The first line of input contains a positive integer number N (1 < N < 105). This is the number of following input lines. The next N lines contain, each one, a integer non-negative number.
name: Even and Odd
description: Considering the input of non-negative integer values​​, sort these numbers ​​according to the following criteria: First the even in ascending order followed by the odd in descending order.
